q: the company needed a more mature leader. Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Page and Google Inc. 's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google Inc. 's executive chairman. The changes will be effective April 4. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, Eric Schmidt said. Page praised Eric Schmidt , too. "There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly," Page said.
